Texts.Eng:
Although they are the same species, nocturnal Saturnians usually prefer their more traditional name, Thaumoths. They are from the strange, moon worshiping, treetop country Actias. Thaumoths tend to practice what Saturnians call dark magic. They are also highly skilled with bows and scythes.
    
 Diet: Herbivore
